Title: Provides for procedural limits on the sale of real property by certain public officers to the state
Summary: Provides for procedural limits on the sale of real property by certain public officers to the state similar to the sale of goods and services.
LawCode: Amd ยง73, Pub Off L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public officers law, in relation to the sale of real property to the state by certain public officials
